definitions: a person who practices outdoor survival skills as a sport or hobby
shortDefinitions: person who practises outdoor survival skills as sport or hobby

definitions: a person who tries to ensure their own survival or that of their social or national group

examples.text: a paranoid survivalist bracing for Armageddon

shortDefinitions: person who tries to ensure their own survival or that of their social or national group

definitions: relating to the practicing of outdoor survival skills as a sport or hobby
shortDefinitions: relating to practising of outdoor survival skills as sport or hobby

definitions: relating to the policy of trying to ensure one's own survival or that of one's social or national group

examples.text: a creature of habit driven by a survivalist instinct
she developed a ruthless survivalist streak
